TopicTitle: Station Module Sharing Thread - Help out those in need!

Articles.Content:
Hey, Kyrian here,

I've created this thread for people to post their Space Station modules for people who may not be as good at making parts for their stations.

I encourage as many people as possible to post at least one screenshot and a download link of any station modules that are useful / helpful.

They MUST be stock, however.

I hope to see many people posting, for I myself, and I'm sure many others, can never seem to put anything on their stations that actually work.

Introducing the Airlock Module, Argo! It has an cabin for changing into the spacesuit and for equalizing the air, and a airlock that has an MMU

(Manned Maneuvering Unit)

-Old Post... http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50133-Manned-Maneuvering-Unit-%28MMU%29?highlight=manned+maneuvering+unit).

The Airlock Module may seem slightly different from the picture, and that's because I added some batteries, a Remote control unit and some ladders to it.

-Download link: http://www./view/1iucu6b78noy1gw/Airlock%20module.craft

Well here it is on my Aquarius Space Station. (service module still attached)

Service module seperated (better quality)

Here's Gregory coming out for a Soyuz inspection.

Grabbing the MMU.

The Soyuz (inspection)

Inspection complete, returning back to Argo.

Edited December 8, 2013 by xoknight

Uhh my eyes!(the blurr)

Please read the showcase guidlines where it clearly states that you must use max quality when taking pics in KSP and sharing them.
I'm sorry, my computer's crappy and my Space Station is a killer. Also I cannot find any "showcase guidelines" which specifically demands me to take screenshots in high definition.

Hey, Kyrian here,

I've created this thread for people to post their Space Station modules for people who may not be as good at making parts for their stations.

I encourage as many people as possible to post at least one screenshot and a download link of any station modules that are useful / helpful.

They MUST be stock, however.

I hope to see many people posting, for I myself, and I'm sure many others, can never seem to put anything on their stations that actually work.

Nothing that says anything about screenshot quality... If you're gonna criticise, at least give yourself some grounds to do so.

To be honest, I don't care about image quality. As long as it shows the module and its function, it's good enough for this thread.

By the way, xoknight, that MMU is amazing!!

Please read the showcase guidelines
What showcase guidelines would these be?

Here's not a module, but an all-in-one station-in-a-launch package:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

From my Cargo SSTO collection (halfway down)
I wonder if it could lift the Control Tower?
Thanks folks! Waiting for the SABRE engine in 0.23 to do an update.
Just bumping this thread so new players who may need station help will see it.
I'll show off one of my recent updates to my Zanya Core module later, when I get home.
